subject: Re: EDR 23-12-2024
content: Hi Akhilesh, Today Azruddin was at the office for formal induction and joining, please let him know the processes and ensure that he joins the HQ location(Ajmer) by or before the 26th of this month and share the detailed address and location of the residential address at Ajmer with the HR within the stipulated time. Regards, Dinesh On Mon, 23 Dec 2024 at 21:35, Akhilesh Joshi <akhilesh.joshi@nxfin.in
